snippet: A bill moving through the California Legislature could make it possible for children to have three or four legal parents, not just two. There are some objections.
abstract: Bill moving through the California Legislature could make it possible for children to have three or four legal parents, opening the door for alternative families to seek legal recognition of their relationships; the bill is opposed by some conservative groups, who say it is an attempt to radically redefine the family.
lead_paragraph: A bill moving through the California Legislature could make it possible for children to have three or four legal parents, not just two. There are some objections.

headline.seo: A California Bill Would Legalize Third- and Fourth-Parent Adoptions
headline.main: Measure Opens Door to Three Parents, or Four
headline.print_headline: Measure Opens Door To 3 Parents, or More
